charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT FOR 37 MNTHS ON EA OF CNTS 1,2,3,4,6 &; 7 CONCURRENTLY EA CNT IN AN IN-PATIENT PSYCHIATRIC FACILITY. 3 YRS SUPERVISED REL IMPOSED ON CNTS 1,2,3,4,6 &; 7 CONCURRENTLY UPON FOL TERMS &; CONDS: OBEY ALL RULES &; REGULATIONS OF PO &; GO 225; OBEY ALL FED, STATE &; LOCAL LAWS. $50 SPEC ASSESSMENT FEE IMPOSED PER COUNT FOR A TOTAL OF $300 PURS TO 18:3013 PAY TO US TREASURY-US ATTY 312 N SPRING ST, RM 1347, LOS ANGELES CA 90012. DFT SHALL NOT DIR OR INDIR CONTACT VICTIM KATARINA WITT; DFT SHALL PARTICIPATE IN A PSYCHOLOGICAL/PSYCHIATRIC CNSLNG OR TRTMNT PROG AS APPRVD &; DIR BY USPO. ALL FINES ARE WAIVED INCLUDING COSTS OF IMPRISONMENT &; SUPV AS DFT HAS NO ABILITY TO PAY. (1)
